Fn::Join: Lambda function for auto-deleting objects in

CloudFrontOriginAccessIdentityConfig.Comment: Allows CloudFront to reach the bucket

Properties.Description: Lambda function for removing all inbound/outbound rules from the VPC default security group

Properties.GroupDescription: Automatically created Security Group for ELB CdkIlluminationsStackIntegTestServiceLB0DCCE547

SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Properties.Description: Automatically created by the RestApi construct

Source.BuildSpec:
{
  "version": "0.2",
  "phases": {
    "install": {
      "runtime-versions": {
        "nodejs": 20
      }
    },
    "build": {
      "commands": [
        "current_dir=$(pwd)",
        "
echo "$input"
for obj in $(echo "$input" | jq -r '.[] | @base64'); do
  decoded=$(echo "$obj" | base64 --decode)
  assetUrl=$(echo "$decoded" | jq -r '.assetUrl')
  extractPath=$(echo "$decoded" | jq -r '.extractPath')
  commands=$(echo "$decoded" | jq -r '.commands')

  # Download the zip file
  aws s3 cp "$assetUrl" temp.zip

  # Extract the zip file to the extractPath directory
  mkdir -p "$extractPath"
  unzip temp.zip -d "$extractPath"

  # Remove the zip file
  rm temp.zip

  # Run the specified commands in the extractPath directory
  cd "$extractPath"
  ls -la
  eval "$commands"
  cd "$current_dir"
  ls -la
done
              ",
        "ls -la",
        "cd "$workingDirectory"",
        "eval "$buildCommands"",
        "ls -la",
        "cd "$current_dir"",
        "cd "$outputSourceDirectory"",
        "zip -r output.zip ./",
        "aws s3 cp output.zip "s3://$destinationBucketName/$destinationObjectKey""
      ]
    },
    "post_build": {
      "commands": [
        "echo Build completed on `date`",
        "
STATUS='SUCCESS'
if [ $CODEBUILD_BUILD_SUCCEEDING -ne 1 ] # Test if the build is failing
then
STATUS='FAILED'
REASON="NodejsBuild failed. See CloudWatch Log stream for the detailed reason: 
https://$AWS_REGION.console.aws.amazon.com/cloudwatch/home?region=$AWS_REGION#logsV2:log-groups/log-group/\$252Faws\$252Fcodebuild\$252F$projectName/log-events/$CODEBUILD_LOG_PATH"
fi
cat <<EOF > payload.json
{
  "StackId": "$stackId",
  "RequestId": "$requestId",
  "LogicalResourceId":"$logicalResourceId",
  "PhysicalResourceId": "$logicalResourceId",
  "Status": "$STATUS",
  "Reason": "$REASON",
  "Data": {
    "destinationObjectKey": "$destinationObjectKey"
  }
}
EOF
curl -v -i -X PUT -H 'Content-Type:' -d "@payload.json" "$responseURL"
              "
      ]
    }
  }
}
